quiz.question: _______ velvety
quiz.explanation: 天鹅绒般的,天鹅绒般的声音。The singer's velvety voice captivated the entire audience.歌手天鹅绒般的声音迷住了整个观众。

quiz.question: ______ drafty
quiz.explanation: 透风的,透风的房间。The drafty room made it impossible to stay warm in winter.透风的房间使得冬天无法保持温暖。

quiz.question: ______ shifty
quiz.explanation: 狡猾的,狡猾的眼睛。The suspect's shifty eyes made the detective suspicious.嫌疑人狡猾的眼睛让侦探起疑。

quiz.question: _____ lofty
quiz.explanation: 崇高的,崇高的理想。The politician spoke of lofty ideals but delivered little.政治家谈论崇高的理想,但兑现很少。

quiz.question: _______ weighty
quiz.explanation: 重大的,重大的问题。The committee discussed the weighty matter of budget allocation.委员会讨论了预算分配的重大问题。

quiz.question: ______ ferocity
quiz.explanation: 凶猛,野蛮的凶猛。The tiger attacked with savage ferocity to protect its territory.老虎以野蛮的凶猛攻击以保护其领地。

quiz.question: rapidity __ ______
quiz.explanation: 快速,变化的快速。The rapidity of change in technology surprised everyone.技术变化的快速让每个人都感到惊讶。

quiz.question: _____ technicality
quiz.explanation: 技术细节,法律技术细节。The case was dismissed on a legal technicality rather than merit.案件因法律技术细节而被驳回,而不是根据案情。

quiz.question: ___ __ finality
quiz.explanation: 终结性,终结性的气氛。He spoke with an air of finality that ended all discussion.他以终结性的气氛说话,结束了所有讨论。

quiz.question: ______ punctuality
quiz.explanation: 守时,严格守时。The military demanded strict punctuality from all soldiers.军队要求所有士兵严格守时。

quiz.question: __ ___ eventuality
quiz.explanation: 可能性,在任何可能性下。The plan was designed to work in any eventuality.该计划被设计为在任何可能性下都能奏效。

quiz.question: nobility __ ______
quiz.explanation: 高贵,精神的高贵。Her nobility of spirit inspired everyone she met.她精神的高贵激励了她遇到的每个人。

quiz.question: ______ servility
quiz.explanation: 奴性,卑贱的奴性。The prisoner's abject servility disgusted the guards.囚犯卑贱的奴性让看守感到厌恶。

quiz.question: _____ __ incredulity
quiz.explanation: 怀疑,怀疑地凝视。The audience could only stare in incredulity at the impossible feat.观众只能怀疑地凝视着不可能的壮举。

quiz.question: ____ enmity
quiz.explanation: 敌意,深深的敌意。Deep enmity existed between the rival families for generations.对立家族之间世代存在深深的敌意。

quiz.question: ______ ___ indignity
quiz.explanation: 侮辱,遭受侮辱。The prisoner had to suffer the indignity of public humiliation.囚犯不得不遭受公开羞辱的侮辱。

quiz.question: _____ hilarity
quiz.explanation: 欢闹,引起欢闹。The comedian's jokes would cause hilarity throughout the theater.喜剧演员的笑话会在整个剧院引起欢闹。

quiz.question: _____ ____ asperity
quiz.explanation: 严厉,严厉地说话。The angry teacher would speak with asperity to misbehaving students.愤怒的老师会对行为不端的学生严厉地说话。

quiz.question: _____ __ superiority
quiz.explanation: 优越感,优越感。His arrogant sense of superiority alienated his colleagues.他傲慢的优越感疏远了他的同事。

quiz.question: ___ immensity __ _____
quiz.explanation: 广阔,空间的广阔。Astronauts are awed by the immensity of space surrounding Earth.宇航员对围绕地球的空间的广阔感到敬畏。

quiz.question: _ ____ nonentity
quiz.explanation: 无足轻重的人,无足轻重的人。In the company hierarchy, he felt like a mere nonentity.在公司层级中,他觉得自己像个无足轻重的人。

quiz.question: ______ fruity
quiz.explanation: 果味的,果味的香气。The wine had a rich fruity aroma of berries and plums.葡萄酒有浓郁的浆果和李子的果味香气。

quiz.question: receptivity __ ______
quiz.explanation: 接受性,对变化的接受性。The company's receptivity to change helped it survive.公司对变化的接受性帮助它存活下来。

quiz.question: _______ festivities
quiz.explanation: 庆祝活动,节日庆祝活动。The town prepared for the holiday festivities with decorations.小镇用装饰品为节日庆祝活动做准备。

quiz.question: ______ jaunty
quiz.explanation: 活泼的,活泼的步伐。He had a jaunty walk that showed his confident mood.他有活泼的步伐,显示出自信的心情。

quiz.question: _____ runty
quiz.explanation: 矮小的,矮小的孩子。The runty kid was always the last picked for sports teams.矮小的孩子总是最后被选入运动队。

quiz.question: _______ maggoty
quiz.explanation: 生蛆的,生蛆的肉。The maggoty meat had been left out in the heat too long.生蛆的肉在高温下放置太久了。

quiz.question: _____ sooty
quiz.explanation: 煤烟的,煤烟的烟雾。Sooty smoke billowed from the factory chimney.煤烟的烟雾从工厂烟囱中滚滚而出。

quiz.question: ______ hearty
quiz.explanation: 丰盛的,丰盛的一餐。The travelers enjoyed a hearty meal after their long journey.旅行者在长途旅行后享用了丰盛的一餐。

quiz.question: _____ warty
quiz.explanation: 有疣的,有疣的生长物。The warty growth on the tree trunk looked unsightly.树干上有疣的生长物看起来很难看。

quiz.question: ___ shirty
quiz.explanation: 生气的,变得生气。Don't get shirty with me just because you're having a bad day.不要仅仅因为你今天心情不好就对我生气。

quiz.question: _____ hasty
quiz.explanation: 草率的,草率的决定。The hasty decision led to regrettable consequences later.草率的决定后来导致了令人遗憾的后果。

quiz.question: _____ pasty
quiz.explanation: 苍白的,苍白的肤色。His pasty complexion suggested he spent too much time indoors.他苍白的肤色表明他在室内待得太久了。

quiz.question: _____ testy
quiz.explanation: 易怒的,易怒的回答。The tired doctor gave a testy reply to the repeated question.疲惫的医生对重复的问题给出了易怒的回答。

quiz.question: _ travesty __ _______
quiz.explanation: 歪曲,对正义的歪曲。The unfair trial was a travesty of justice that shocked everyone.不公平的审判是对正义的歪曲,震惊了所有人。

quiz.question: _____ pigsty
quiz.explanation: 猪圈,凌乱的猪圈。Your bedroom looks like a messy pigsty; clean it up immediately.你的卧室看起来像个凌乱的猪圈,立即清理它。

quiz.question: ______ frosty
quiz.explanation: 冷淡的,冷淡的接待。The proposal received a frosty reception from the committee.该提案受到委员会的冷淡接待。

quiz.question: _____ musty
quiz.explanation: 发霉的,发霉的气味。The old basement had a musty smell of mildew and decay.旧地下室有发霉和腐烂的发霉气味。

quiz.question: ______ crusty
quiz.explanation: 有硬皮的,有硬皮的面包。The freshly baked crusty bread was delicious with butter.新鲜烘焙的有硬皮面包配黄油很美味。

quiz.question: __ batty
quiz.explanation: 发疯的,发疯。The isolation was enough to make anyone go batty.孤立足以让任何人发疯。

quiz.question: _____ tatty
quiz.explanation: 破旧的,破旧的衣服。The homeless man wore tatty clothes that were falling apart.无家可归的男人穿着正在破碎的破旧衣服。

quiz.question: _____ bitty
quiz.explanation: 小碎片的,小碎片。The vase shattered into bitty pieces across the floor.花瓶在地板上摔成小碎片。

quiz.question: ______ gritty
quiz.explanation: 坚毅的,坚毅的决心。Her gritty determination helped her overcome every obstacle.她坚毅的决心帮助她克服了每一个障碍。

quiz.question: ______ knotty
quiz.explanation: 棘手的,棘手的问题。The lawyers struggled with the knotty problem for weeks.律师们与棘手的问题斗争了几周。

quiz.question: _____ potty
quiz.explanation: 便盆,便盆训练。The toddler was ready to begin potty training at age two.幼儿在两岁时准备开始便盆训练。

quiz.question: ______ spotty
quiz.explanation: 参差不齐的,参差不齐的记录。The employee's spotty record made promotion unlikely.员工参差不齐的记录使晋升不太可能。

quiz.question: _____ nutty
quiz.explanation: 坚果味的,坚果味。The dessert had a rich nutty flavor from toasted almonds.甜点有烤杏仁的浓郁坚果味。

quiz.question: _____ gravy
quiz.explanation: 肉汁,肉汁船。She poured the gravy from the gravy boat over the potatoes.她从肉汁船里把肉汁倒在土豆上。

quiz.question: chivy _____
quiz.explanation: 催促,催促前进。The shepherd would chivy along the slow-moving sheep.牧羊人会催促行动缓慢的羊前进。

quiz.question: _____ curvy
quiz.explanation: 曲线美的,曲线美的身材。The actress was admired for her curvy figure.这位女演员因其曲线美的身材而受到赞赏。

quiz.question: ______ scurvy
quiz.explanation: 坏血病,坏血病。Sailors suffered from scurvy disease due to lack of vitamin C.水手因缺乏维生素C而患坏血病。

quiz.question: chivvy _____
quiz.explanation: 催促,催促前进。The teacher would chivvy along students who were dawdling.老师会催促磨蹭的学生前进。

quiz.question: ____ dewy
quiz.explanation: 露珠般的,露珠般的皮肤。The moisturizer promised to give her dewy skin like a baby's.保湿霜承诺给她像婴儿般露珠般的皮肤。

quiz.question: ______ sinewy
quiz.explanation: 肌肉发达的,肌肉发达的手臂。The rock climber had strong sinewy arms from years of training.攀岩者经过多年训练有强壮肌肉发达的手臂。

quiz.question: ____ waxy
quiz.explanation: 蜡质的,蜡质堆积。Waxy buildup on the furniture needed to be cleaned off.家具上的蜡质堆积需要清除。

quiz.question: ____ hazy
quiz.explanation: 模糊的,模糊的记忆。He had only a hazy memory of that night's events.他对那晚事件只有模糊的记忆。

quiz.question: ______ breezy
quiz.explanation: 微风习习的,微风习习的一天。It was a perfect breezy day for sailing on the lake.这是在湖上航行的完美微风习习的一天。

quiz.question: ____ dozy
quiz.explanation: 困倦的,感到困倦。The warm afternoon sun made him feel dozy and relaxed.温暖的午后阳光使他感到困倦和放松。

quiz.question: _____ gauzy
quiz.explanation: 薄纱的,薄纱面料。The curtains were made of light gauzy fabric that moved in the breeze.窗帘由轻薄纱面料制成,在微风中摆动。

quiz.question: ____ dizzy
quiz.explanation: 头晕的,感到头晕。The spinning ride made her feel dizzy and nauseous.旋转的游乐设施使她感到头晕和恶心。

quiz.question: _____ fizzy
quiz.explanation: 起泡的,起泡的饮料。The children enjoyed the sweet fizzy drink at the party.孩子们在聚会上享用甜的起泡饮料。

quiz.question: ___ fez
quiz.explanation: 土耳其毡帽,红色土耳其毡帽。The man wore a traditional red fez as part of his costume.男人戴着传统的红色土耳其毡帽作为服装的一部分。

quiz.question: ________ whiz
quiz.explanation: 能手,电脑能手。The teenager was a computer whiz who could fix any problem.这个青少年是个电脑能手,能解决任何问题。

quiz.question: ______ chintz
quiz.explanation: 印花棉布,印花棉布窗帘。The cottage had floral chintz curtains in every room.小屋的每个房间都有花卉印花棉布窗帘。

quiz.question: ____ fizz
quiz.explanation: 嘶嘶声,苏打水的嘶嘶声。The soda lost its fizz after being left open overnight.苏打水开着放了一夜后失去了嘶嘶声。

quiz.question: _____ whizz
quiz.explanation: 飞驰而过,飞驰而过。Cars would whizz past on the busy highway.汽车会在繁忙的高速公路上飞驰而过。

quiz.question: _____ fuzz
quiz.explanation: 绒毛,桃子绒毛。The peach had soft peach fuzz covering its skin.桃子的皮肤上覆盖着柔软的桃子绒毛。
